sentences.english: Where all is obscure and unrealized the best similitude is a dream.
sentences.chinese: 一切都是模糊而非現實的，酷似一場夢。

sentences.english: Its height measures at 12 meters while its exterior appearance is reminiscent of a warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 整座建築物高約12米，外觀酷似一個倉庫。

sentences.english: "Bamboo Willow" have no relation with bamboo at all but were so named for the remarkable growth properties.
sentences.chinese: 以其向高向上的生長形態酷似竹子，被命名爲竹柳。

sentences.english: He was a man of much worldly wisdom, and in some ways resembled Voltaire.
sentences.chinese: 他精於人情世故，在某些方面酷似伏爾泰。

sentences.english: Their resemblance to cuddly toys is a base deceit.
sentences.chinese: 酷似絨毛玩具讓人想抱在懷裏的外表根本就是騙人的。

sentences.english: From afar, the car by the island resembles a ship mooring landing ships.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠望去，車由島酷似一艘錨泊的登陸艦。

sentences.english: One of these skits, "The King of Beasts" resembles a traditional frontier prank.
sentences.chinese: 一出滑稽短劇《獸王》酷似傳統的邊疆鬧劇。

sentences.english: She is the very image of her mother.; She strongly resembles her mother.
The Nine-lotus Hill is so named for the 9 closely connected mountain peaks looking like a lotus.
sentences.chinese: 九蓮山因有九峯相連，酷似蓮花而得名。

sentences.english: Eryi Building is round-shaped and exactly like the ancient castle, but is different.
sentences.chinese: 二宜樓呈圓形，酷似古城堡形，但又不同於城堡。

sentences.english: Because of their dense soft fur fabric, like otters, it is known as Rex Rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 因其皮毛絨密柔軟，酷似水獺，故在我國通稱爲獺兔。

sentences.english: The serpentine is so named, because its long slender barrel resembles a snake.
sentences.chinese: 蛇炮炮管修長，酷似巨蛇，故由此得名。

sentences.english: Another depicts Christ as a figurine with Mickey Mouse ears.
sentences.chinese: 另一件展品是長着酷似米老鼠耳朵的小型耶穌像。

sentences.english: We find the mother featured in the son.
sentences.chinese: 我們發現此兒酷似其母。

sentences.english: Unusual notepads designed to look like real chocolate bars.
sentences.chinese: 不同尋常的便條簿，造型酷似店裏的巧克力塊。

definition: similar in expression and spirit/to bear a remarkable resemblance to
to resemble one another/to be alike/similar
exactly the same (idiom)/carbon copy/also pr. [yi1 mo2 yi1 yang4]
